TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content: Oh by the way I have a legitimate b52 and f117 stealth bomber in the works. Possibly f22 aswell if anyone is interested. Because awesome. I am yet to model the x-15.... screenshots tonight if time allows

Note in v1.7 trial just released: do not apply jeasts aero patch to it, it was designed for the multi piece shuttle In a previous version. It will cause problems.

This is designed differently.

Any new issues will be fixed as they arise.

Also make sure that the older css is removed before installing this v1.7

Also the download on page one is old and will be replaced.

Any confusion or issues please ask and I will help.

Thanks. 

Mike.

Nice picture by PatrickTeu:

![64D4Nbs.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/64D4Nbs.jpg)
Its simply awesome. I now rey to dock with my KSS. Lets see how its working. Discovery is right now in orbit and approaches it.

next addition started tonight. almost done.

the SLIC

Super Lightweight Interchangeable Carrier

it will be kinda heavy to be fair.

hold your exuipment in it

has tank for extra monoprop and xenon (for extended generator life)

science storage

animated lid

mesh switchable

![dKiIDyy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/dKiIDyy.jpg)

- - - Updated - - -

still needs its clamps, rails etc and infernal robotics

v1.7.1 fix

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/m2qjfdi8c1nbg4l/v1.7.1.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/m2qjfdi8c1nbg4l/v1.7.1.zip?dl=0)

extract the contents to your gamedata/Space\_Shuttle/Parts/ directory. overwrite all

fixes:

booster no longer stops accelerating past 40m/s

external tank collider redone to avoid clipping and less memory intensve

external tank rotated so rotating to place on shttle in the VAB no longer required.

adjusted specific impulses and fuel levels

for the SLIC model (untextured)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/fx033qsqzvhouqb/Space_Shuttle.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fx033qsqzvhouqb/Space_Shuttle.zip?dl=0)

enjoy and let me know if any issues

Also fixed the "coulmbia" typo on bay doors but forgot to include it.

And the rear rcs will be fixed soon

Hey Mike. Awesome mod.

The only thing Is that the Dream Chaser wouldn't fit inside the Shuttle (in reality). Dream Chaser has a wingspan of around 7 Meters ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dream_Chaser](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dream_Chaser); [http://www.space.com/19551-dream-chaser-space-plane-flight-test.html](http://www.space.com/19551-dream-chaser-space-plane-flight-test.html)) and the payload bay of the Shuttle is only 4.6 Meters wide ([http://www.esa.int/Our_Activities/Human_Spaceflight/Space_Shuttle/Shuttle_technical_facts](http://www.esa.int/Our_Activities/Human_Spaceflight/Space_Shuttle/Shuttle_technical_facts)).

EDIT: Wrote this before looking at your last post.

I am getting weird control issues at 6000 m with the full dreamchaser stack. It totally cuts out, I experienced this before, it seems loose all control and the camera isn't centered on it anymore. Was able to launch other rockets fine. 

About here is when I loose control. 

[http://imgur.com/gallery/nLB3Zfq/new](http://imgur.com/gallery/nLB3Zfq/new)

> 
> I am getting weird control issues at 6000 m with the full dreamchaser stack. It totally cuts out, I experienced this before, it seems loose all control and the camera isn't centered on it anymore. Was able to launch other rockets fine. 
> About here is when I loose control. 
> 
> [http://imgur.com/gallery/nLB3Zfq/new](http://imgur.com/gallery/nLB3Zfq/new)

I can guarantee it is caused by getting damaged by torque/aero/heat. Due to part strength but it stays together. I have not dont much to the DC yet. Will get it better. Thanks for issue report
Great! At least it was an easily identifiable issue.
Anyone having issues with cargobay animations?

I am surprised to say this, as I never was a fan of unofficial release, but, I seriously want to play with your mod release! Looks awesome! you should send some of your extra parts to dragon to be added into the official release eventually!

This is becoming its own mod. Kerbal shuttle program - or something. Where as the Shuttle is only part of it. It will basically be nasa vehicles and missions with lots of variety. He may make a better model but I want to add extra gameplay and things to do...

Regarding that control issue: Try to put down the thrust to TWR = 2 at most and add some fins to that stage as well + KJR if you dont have yet. It should counter your issue pretty well. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
